content:
# Hyper-Engine

I've developed a game engine showcasing my expertise in C++ and OpenGL.

It's a versatile framework with Lua scripting, ~~ideal~~ for
rapid prototyping and well-documented for ease of use.

# Pseudonym-App

An anonymous messaging application, that allows users to receive message from a sender without knowing their identity.

# Gists

Gists is a web application inspired by GitHub Gists, designed for seamless sharing of notes, code snippets, and ideas. It serves as a public platform for creating a compact discussion forum, enabling users to effortlessly exchange thoughts and insights with others. By providing a hassle-free environment for sharing and collaborating, Gists aims to facilitate knowledge sharing and foster a sense of community among users. - Meta AI
